game.name: Lucerna
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A horror dungeon crawler where darkness reshapes the maze. Find keys, manage light, and choose: escape or descend. Online co-op for 1–5 players.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A horror dungeon crawler where darkness reshapes the maze. Find keys, manage light, and choose: escape or descend. Online co-op for 1–5 players.
